topic.title: Reset Syllabification
topic.shortdesc: In the event of display issues in Target Syllables or Actual Syllables in the Syllabification & Alignment view, it may be necessary to reset the syllabification of IPA Target and IPA Actual transcriptions.

topicmeta.shortdesc: In the event of display issues in Target Syllables or Actual Syllables in the Syllabification & Alignment view, it may be necessary to reset the syllabification of IPA Target and IPA Actual transcriptions.

topic.title: Reset Phone Alignment
topic.shortdesc: In the event of display issues in the Alignment tier of the Syllabification & Alignment view, it may be necessary to reset the phone alignment of IPA Target and IPA Actual transcriptions.

topicmeta.shortdesc: In the event of display issues in the Alignment tier of the Syllabification & Alignment view, it may be necessary to reset the phone alignment of IPA Target and IPA Actual transcriptions.

topic.title: About Editor Views
topic.shortdesc: Information in each session is displayed in a series of small windows within the Session Editor, called views. There are several types of views:

topicmeta.shortdesc: Information in each session is displayed in a series of small windows within the Session Editor, called views. There are several types of views:

topic.title: Play Adjacency Sequence

topic.shortdesc: Play the media segment specified in the currently visible record.
